Class OIndexFullText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.index.OIndexAbstract<Set<OIdentifiable>>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OIndex<Set<OIdentifiable>>, OIndexInternal<Set<OIdentifiable>>, OOrientShutdownListener, OOrientStartupListener, Comparable<OIndex<Set<OIdentifiable>>>

    public class OIndexFullText
extends OIndexMultiValues
    Fast index for full-text searches.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public OIndexFullText put(Object key,
                          OIdentifiable singleValue)
        Indexes a value and save the index. Splits the value in single words and index each one. Save of the index is responsibility of the caller.
        Specified by:
        put in interface OIndex<Set<OIdentifiable>>
        Overrides:
        put in class OIndexMultiValues
        Parameters:
        key - Entry's key
        singleValue - Entry's value as OIdentifiable instance
        Returns:
        The index instance itself to allow in chain calls

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Object key,
                      OIdentifiable value)
        Splits passed in key on several words and remove records with keys equals to any item of split result and values equals to passed in value.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface OIndex<Set<OIdentifiable>>
        Overrides:
        remove in class OIndexMultiValues
        Parameters:
        key - Key to remove.
        value - Value to remove.
        Returns:
        true if at least one record is removed.
